title: Phoenix Tears or, Hermione Granger and the DH
description:
Sequel to 
 Phoenix Song or, Hermione Granger and the HB P
. By the time of Dumbledore's death, Hermione and Snape had worked together for a whole year. Now, however, they both have very different and very difficult tasks ahead of them.[NOTE: Part three of this trilogy, Phoenix Fire, or Hermione Granger and the EW, is currently IN PROGRESS, thus not added on goodreads yet as per site rules on fanfiction. It can be found at Fanfiction.net as well.]
author: grangerous
